bio:
After 18 years working in local government as a SOCITM award winning webmaster and developer, Steve is working as a Digital Accessibility specialist for the University of Westminster.

Eur Ing Stephen Wilkinson PGCert BSc(Hons) CEng MBCS CITP AdvancedRITTech RITTech

International Association of Accessibility Professionals (IAAP)
IAAP Certified Professional in Accessibility Core Competencies (CPACC)

Pronouns: he/him
title: Senior Digital Accessibility Analyst
